channel.title: Deskpins
channel.description:
I love ubuntu's feature to keep items always pinned on top of other windows. ( I will normally keep amsn opened and play runescape at the same time. ) I got curious and did a search for a software that did something similar to Windows. Thought I'd share the link here cause it's very useful.
http://www.snapfiles.com/get/deskpins.html

item.title: Deskpins
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:8, topic:432445”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=535159.msg3912495#msg3912495 date=1328894635]

right click on a window bar if using X and select always on top.

edit: oh, you’re not asking how
[/quote]not asking how

I love ubuntu this is one of the many features linux has but windows does not. This is just simply a link to some freeware that makes a similar feature for it for windows.

Windows has it, I’m just to lazy to right click on something and click always on top.

ummmm… i don’t see that feature?[/quote]^ this

tell me yo secret

Read full topic

item.title: Deskpins
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:3, topic:432445”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=535159.msg3912379#msg3912379 date=1328884000]
I’ve had that for a while. (:
[/quote]it’s very useful I have uploaded it to my mediafire as well to make sure I always have a copy[/quote]
Great for watching shows while playing a game or working on something. Using it to watch Metalocalypse while fletching in rs right now.

Read full topic
